spektrogram ( sound + design + code )

  • Lasse Munk

  • Composer, sound artist and creative coder in performing arts, web, film and installations
  • PHONE> + 45 26 84 44 41
  • MAIL>lasse --- spektrogram --- dk

  • education

  • 2014 - 2017>B.A. Sound Design. Danish National School of Performing Arts
  • 2011 - 2014>Profession Bachelor. Sound Design. Sonic College, Denmark.
  • 2014 - 2014>Radio France. Paris. B.A. Thesis: Int- & externalization w. Binaural Synthesis
  • 2008 - 2011>Preparation for Music Conservatory (MGK). Instrument: Guitar
